title: League of legends Tablet style
body: is it possible to play LOL on a tablet? .... Anyone?

replies.body:
The short answer is no.

The long answer is *technically and only probably* yes, but only with a lot of awkward addons and a huge disadvantage which would sort of defeat the purpose.
Who cares if you can, I want to know why you would want to. O_o Jokes aside though, why not just play that shitty mobile knock-off so you wouldn't be disabling your team?
